eg.utils

Class ScreenParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.utils.ScreenParams

  • public class ScreenParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Static constants and methods to obtain quantities that depend on the screen size and resolution

    • Method Detail

      • scaledDimension

        public static java.awt.Dimension scaledDimension(int width,
                                                 int height)
        Returns the Dimension with the specified width and height scaled to the ratio between screen resolution and graphic resolution
        Parameters:
        width - the width in pt
        height - the height in pt
        Returns:
        a new scaled Dimension

      • scaledSize

        public static int scaledSize(double size)
        Returns an integer that is the rounded product of the specified size and the resolution ratio.
        This ratio is the screen resolution divided by the resolution assumed by Java's Graphics2D (72 dpi). However, when the program is run using Java 9 the resolution ratio is constantly 96/72 when the operating system is Windows and 1 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        size - the size
        Returns:
        the rounded rescaled size
